pages.title: Teleportation Crystal
pages.text: This item is the only way to enter the $(l:e_dimension_insanity_dimension)Insanity/el and $(l:e_dimension_depth_dimension)Depth/el dimensions. To teleport between dimensions you need to have enough $(l:e_mana_player_mana)Mana/el./br1The $(l:e_dimension_insanity_dimension)Insanity Dimension/el and overworld can be reached with a simple right-click and the $(l:e_dimension_depth_dimension)Depth Dimension/el with a shift-right-click.
